what

before ive decided that
he can ask me questions about myself

what scares me the most
you might also likeis what if when he sees me what if he doesnt like it

dawn dont you think youre being a little i mean maybe just a tad

im not defensive

why a certain suitor stands in line

what do i do with that

oh god
what if when he sees me
i like him and he knows it
what if he opens up a door

what happens then
if when he holds me
my heart is set in motion
im not prepared for that
